attributes.action: recompense the  remaining family members of excecuted soldiers for the years of unwarrented shame they had to bear for errors and ignorance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please!!!!!! compensate the remaining families for the wrongful execution of those poor servicemen deemed to be cowards by the ignorance of the Government/war department to the physical and mental strain  those poor men endured and were never understood..For generations those poor families had to enjure the stigma that was attatched to them..
